official_title: ACCESS-PC: Advancing Care Coordination to Enhance Shared Care for Complex Cancer Survivors in Primary Care.
exclusion_criteria: * had myocardial infarction or stroke within the previous 1 year; (2) have heart failure with an ejection fraction <30%; (3) have stage IV-V chronic kidney disease (eGFR <30); or do not speak English or Spanish. Patients whose cancer progresses to metastatic disease during the course of the 18-month trial will be allowed to continue to participate unless they voluntarily withdraw
